   Pappas: Neuwagen &amp; Gebrauchtwagen
  </title>
  <meta content="Ob Neuwagen von Mercedes-Benz, smart, Jeep und Maserati oder Gebraucht- und Jahreswagen â€“ wir betreuen Sie bei Autokauf, Finanzierung und Service." name="description"/>

  <meta content="telephone=no" name="format-detection"/>
  <meta content="pappas-at-allgemein" name="unblu:named-area"/>
  <style>
   #x-unblu-root-container [x-unblu-owner="tabroot"]{
        display: none;
    }
  </style>
  <script>
   /* unblu snippet V4.2.20160712 */
    if (!window['unblu']) {
        unblu = {APIKEY: "yQyqoLVmRiejRKq6qAFG4A", SERVER: "https://start.unblu.com"};
        (function() {
            unblu.c = [];
            unblu.registerApiConsumer = function(callback, errorCallback, apiNames) {
                if (callback instanceof Array) {
                    if (window["Promise"]) {
                        return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
                            unblu.c.push({a: callback, c: resolve, e: reject});
                        });
                    } else {
                        throw new Error("Promise not available");
                    }
                }

                unblu.c.push({a: apiNames, c: callback, e: errorCallback});
            }
            unblu.setLocale = function(locale) {
                unblu.l = locale;
            }
            if (!window["x-unblu-tmp-window-name"]) window["x-unblu-tmp-window-name"]=window.name;
            var q = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
            if (q) {
                var g = document.createElement("script");
                g.setAttribute("src", unblu.SERVER + "/unblu/starter.js");
                g.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
                g.setAttribute("defer","defer");
                q.parentNode.appendChild(g);
            }
        })();
    } else {
        if (window.console) {
            var logger = window.console.warn ? window.console.warn : window.console.log
            logger("Existing unblu object detected on loading of unblu. Please check site for double injection!");
        }
    }
  </script>
  <script>
   var unbluAPI;
    unblu.registerApiConsumer(
        function(api) {
            if (typeof api.fatalError != "undefined") {
                // the unblu server has detected, that this browser is not supported
            }

            api.core.system.SystemInfo.isCoBrowsingAvailable({
                onSuccess: function(isAvailable) {
                    if (isAvailable) {
                        unbluAPI = api;

                        app.modules.unblu();
                    } else {
                        console.log('isCoBrowsingAvailable not available')
                    }
                }, onFailure: function(failReason) {
                    console.log(failReason);
                }
            });

        },
        ["core.system", "core.agent.availability", "core.visitor.session"]
    );

    var sessionKey = 'session-chat-shown-once';
    var sessionChatShown = window.sessionStorage.getItem(sessionKey);
    var shownChatValue = '1';
    var showChatInSeconds = 30;

    if(sessionChatShown !== shownChatValue) {
        setTimeout(function() {
            var chatToggle = $('.js-toggle-chat');
            if(chatToggle.length) { chatToggle.click(); }
            window.sessionStorage.setItem(sessionKey, shownChatValue);
        }, showChatInSeconds * 1000);
    }
  </script>

                    if(ls && !ls.getItem("pc-cookie-accepted")) {

                        var code = " <style type=\"text\/css\"> #pc-cookie-notice { background: #3c3c3c; color: #fff; position: fixed; bottom:0; left:0; width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 5px 0 5px; font-family: 'Arial Unicode MS', Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; z-index: 10000; } #pc-cookie-notice a { color: #fff; text-decoration: underline; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-icon { position: absolute; top: 5px; left: 5px; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-message { width: 100%; padding: 0 55px 0 25px; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-message span:after { content: attr(data-content); } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-message a:after { content: attr(data-content); } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-button { position: absolute; top: 3px; right: 20px; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-button button { font-weight: bold; background: #008d4c; border-radius: 2px; border:1px solid #000; padding: 1px 5px; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-button button:after { content: attr(data-content); } @media (max-width: 750px) { #pc-cookie-notice #pc-icon { display: none; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-message { padding-left: 5px; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-button { right:5px; top:5px; } #pc-cookie-notice #pc-button button { padding: 5px 3px; } } <\/style><div id=\"pc-cookie-notice\"><div id=\"pc-icon\"><\/div><div id=\"pc-message\"><span data-content=\"Cookies helfen uns bei der Bereitstellung unserer Dienste.                         var ci = window.setInterval(function () {
                            if(document.body) {
                                clearInterval(ci);
                                document.body.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend", code);

                                document.getElementById("pc-button").onclick = function () {
                                    document.getElementById("pc-cookie-notice").style.display = "none";
                                    ls.setItem("pc-cookie-accepted", "true");
                                };
                            }
                        }, 100);
                    }
                })();
  </script>

    <div class="container">
     <div class="Arrange Arrange--withGutter-10">
      <div class="Arrange-sizeFill text-right">
       <ul class="metabar__list list-inline">
        <li>
         <a href="/" target="">
          <span class="metabar__list__icon icon icon-steeringwheel fz16">
          </span>
          Mehr als 3.000 Fahrzeuge sofort verfÃ¼gbar
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/unternehmen/standorte" target="">
          <span class="metabar__list__icon icon icon-location fz16">
          </span>
          25 Verkaufs- und Service-Standorte in Ihrer NÃ¤he
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

   <div class="page-wrapper">
    <main class="hide-focus" id="mainContent" role="main">
     <div class="pimcore_area_portal-header-slider pimcore_area_content">
      <div class="js-slider slider slider--large-btns slider--dots-right-bottom hero-img-slider">
       <section class="slider__item">
        <div class="hero-img hero-img--content-position-center text-center text-uppercase">
         <figure class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-4by1">
          <picture class="embed-responsive-item" data-alt="" data-default-src="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/180000/181074/thumb__hero-img-portal/Webhead_NoVA_3800x950_RZ.jpeg" title="">
           <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/180000/181074/thumb__hero-img-portal/Webhead_NoVA_3800x950_RZ~-~767w.jpeg 1x, /website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/180000/181074/thumb__hero-img-portal/Webhead_NoVA_3800x950_RZ~-~767w@2x.jpeg 2x">
           </source>
           <source srcset="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/180000/181074/thumb__hero-img-portal/Webhead_NoVA_3800x950_RZ.jpeg 1x, /website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/180000/181074/thumb__hero-img-portal/Webhead_NoVA_3800x950_RZ@2x.jpeg 2x">
           </source>
           <img alt="" class="embed-responsive-item" src="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/180000/181074/thumb__hero-img-portal/Webhead_NoVA_3800x950_RZ~-~767w.jpeg" title=""/>
          </picture>
         </figure>
         <div class="hero-img__content hero-img__content---position-relative-xs text-right">
          <div class="container hero-img__content__container">
           <h1 class="hero-img__title">
            <span class="hero-img__small-title ">
             bis zu 6.000 Euro sparen
            </span>
            <span class="">
             Zeigen Sie der NoVa
             <br/>
             die Rote Karte
            </span>
           </h1>
           <small class="fz12" style="text-transform: none;">
           </small>
           <div class="mt15 mb15 animate--last">
            <script>
             _config.scrollTo = true;
            </script>
            <a class="btn btn-primary" href="/unternehmen/neuigkeiten/pkw/pkw-allgemein/20180525-nova-rote-karte">
             Zur Aktion
            </a>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
       <section class="slider__item">
        <div class="hero-img hero-img--content-position-center text-center text-uppercase">
         <figure class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-4by1">
          <picture class="embed-responsive-item" data-alt="" data-default-src="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/170000/171751/thumb__hero-img-portal/Springsale_3800x950_Verlaengerung_RZ.jpeg" title="">

            <div class="row row--gutter-with-24">
             <div class="col col-sm-6">
              <section class="trusted-shops-teaser isClickable">
               <div class="Arrange Arrange--withGutter-20 Arrange--disableOnXs">
                <div class="Arrange-sizeFit">
                 <img alt="" height="100" src="/clients/pappas/at/Portal/pappas-click_and_drive_1by1.png" title="" width="100"/>
                </div>
                <div class="Arrange-sizeFill">
                 <h4 class="mb5">

     <div class="pimcore_area_portal-teaser-grid pimcore_area_content">
      <section class="slide--padding-lg">
       <div class="container">
        <div class="text-center">
         <h2 class="slide__hl js-toc__title">
          Das Wichtigste auf einen Blick
         </h2>
        </div>
        <div class="row row--gutter-with-24 row--vertical-gutter-24 row--same-height">
         <div class="col col-sm-4">
          <section class="img-teaser isClickable js-datalayer" data-layer-action="Der nÃ¤chste Standort" data-layer-category="Teaser">
           <div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-10by12">

          <h2 class="h3 js-toc__title mb15 mt15">
           Aktionsmodelle
          </h2>
          <div class="row row--same-height-sm row--vertical-gutter-24 row--vertical-gutter-24">
           <div class="col col-sm-4">
            <section class="content-teaser isClickable ">
             <div class="row row--gutter-with-12">
              <div class="col col-xs-6 col-sm-12">
               <div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9 bg-whitesmoke ">
                <picture class="embed-responsive-item" data-alt="" data-default-src="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/160000/163293/thumb__content-teaser/teaser-mobile.jpeg">
                 <source media="(max-width: 767px)" srcset="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/160000/163293/thumb__content-teaser/teaser-mobile~-~767w.jpeg 1x, /website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/160000/163293/thumb__content-teaser/teaser-mobile~-~767w@2x.jpeg 2x">
                 </source>
                 <source srcset="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/160000/163293/thumb__content-teaser/teaser-mobile.jpeg 1x, /website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/160000/163293/thumb__content-teaser/teaser-mobile@2x.jpeg 2x">
                 </source>
                 <img alt="" class="embed-responsive-item" src="/website/var/tmp/image-thumbnails/160000/163293/thumb__content-teaser/teaser-mobile~-~767w.jpeg"/>
                </picture>
               </div>
               <div class="content-teaser__additional-info bg-grey-dark">
                <div class="content-teaser__additional-info-content">
                 Sondermodell um
                 <strong class="content-teaser__additional-info-highlight text-nowrap">
                  <span class="price">
                   â‚¬Â 154.990
                  </span>
                 </strong>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="col col-xs-6 col-sm-12">
               <div class="content-teaser__body">

      </div>
